event.title: 1759, José and Eusebio Ceballos Rojas, descendants of Spanish conquistadors, donated

data.event: In 1759, José and Eusebio Ceballos Rojas, descendants of Spanish conquistadors, donated this region the land to construct a chapel.
It is officially recognized that 1759 is the founding year of San Vicente.
The inhabitants of San Vicente Ferrer ended the period of mineral exploration and developed an economy based in the livestock and agricultural industry, that still exists today.
